title:
Litany of Blessed Maria of the Lord Jesus, the Good Shepherd, Franciszka
Siedliska
content:
LITANY OF BLESSED MARIA OF THE LORD JESUS
THE GOOD SHEPHERD, FRANCISZKA SIEDLISKA
Lord, have mercy on us!
Christ, have mercy on us!
Lord, have mercy on us!
Christ, hear us!
Christ, graciously hear us!
Father, the Creator,
have mercy on us.
Son, the Redeemer,
have mercy on us.
Holy Ghost, the Consecrator,
have mercy on us.
Jesus, the Good Shepherd,
have mercy on us.
Holy Mary, the Mother of Christ,
pray for us.
Queen of Families,
pray for us.
Saint Joseph, the Patron of Jesus,
pray for us.
Most Holy Family of Nazareth,
pray for us.
Blessed Mary Franciszka Siedliska,
pray for us.
Glory of Mazovian region,
pray for us.
Bright by the gifts of nature and grace,
pray for us.
Example of perfect communion with Jesus,
pray for us.
Following the Good Shepherd,
pray for us.
Devoted to Mary,
pray for us.
Devoted to Jesus for ever and ever,
pray for us.
Entrusted to Divine Providence,
pray for us.
Looking for God's glory,
pray for us.
Submitted to God's will,
pray for us.
Listened intently in inspiration of the Holy Spirit,
pray for us.
Example of courage in adversities,
pray for us.
Compassionate in relation to humble people,
pray for us.
Faithful Daughter of the Catholic Church,
pray for us.
Foundress and Mother of Congregation,
pray for us.
Dispenser of life-giving word,
pray for us.
Hidden in JesusÂ’ shadow,
pray for us.
Shield of prayer for popes,
pray for us.
Lamp provided with oil of love and faith,
pray for us.
Apostle of the Kingdom of God's Love,
pray for us.
Blessed Gift of the Church for a family,
pray for us.
Lamb of God, who takes away the sins of the world,
spare us, 0 Lord.
Lamb of God, who takes away the sins of the world,
graciously hear us, 0 Lord.
Lamb of God, who takes away the sins of the world,
have mercy on us.
Let us pray:
God, You gifted blessed Maria of the Lord Jesus the Good Shepherd
by a special charisma of life
according to example of the Holy Family of Nazareth,
grant us this grace,
so that we following her example
know how to prompt in Christian families
the desire of life worthy their vocation,
for Your greater glory
and for spreading Your Kingdom on the earth.
Through Christ, our Lord.
Amen.
